content: I'll definitely check out some of those podcasts. I've actually already listened to "All Songs Considered" and "Pitchfork" before, and I really enjoy them. I might try "Song Exploder" next, I've heard great things about it. By the way, speaking of music discovery, I've been creating more playlists on Spotify lately. Do you have any tips on how to organize and manage my playlists effectively?
